forceToAccuseNextTurn(Player) - Method in class fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.Player
Force another player to accuse another opponent than you on their turn, if possible. Called when using the Evil Eye card.
fr.sos.witchhunt - package fr.sos.witchhunt
The application's root package. Package organization is based on the application's MVC architecture.
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller - package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller
'Controller' level of the application's MVC architecture. Contains classes the roles of which are :
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.core - package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.core
Contains the application's core classes, those that are in charge of initializing every core and common component, and of controlling the execution flow.
fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions - package fr.sos.witchhunt.controller.interactions
Classes in this package are in charge of passing information based on user-input gathered from the view to the model, while making sure to keep these two levels independent of each other
fr.sos.witchhunt.model - package fr.sos.witchhunt.model
This package contains all interfaces and classes that are used at plural levels of the MVC-architecture's model.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards - package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.cards
Contains all components defining the different types of cards that are used in this game with their effects, as well as structures for easing their manipulation.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.flow - package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.flow
Contains all classes in charge of controlling the flow of the match, aggregating together and supervising the model's components.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players - package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players
This package contains all elements defining the players, their possible actions within the game and the notifications they can send towards the view level of the MVC architecture.
fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies - package fr.sos.witchhunt.model.players.cpustrategies
This package's purpose is to propose an all-in-one set of tools used to define CPU-controlled players' artificial intelligences,
fr.sos.witchhunt.view - package fr.sos.witchhunt.view
Root of the 'view' level of the Application's MVC architecture. The code of each concurrent view should be organized in its own package.
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui - package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui
This package contains all classes of the Graphical User Interface view.
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes - package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes
Contains components that are common to plural scenes of the GUI View.
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.game - package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.game
Contains the components that are specific to the ingame scene.
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.mainmenu - package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.mainmenu
The GUI View's Main Menu scene, from which the user can access different settings or launch the game.
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.matchsetup - package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.gui.scenes.matchsetup
Contains the components used by the match setup scene.
fr.sos.witchhunt.view.std - package fr.sos.witchhunt.view.std
This package contains all classes of the Console view.
freeze(int) - Method in class fr.sos.witchhunt.model.flow.Tabletop
